FuncDef: The display service-mode card-bandwidth-mode command displays the port bandwidth allocation mode.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of the subcard whose port rate is displayed.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the port bandwidth allocation mode of the 8*622M POS subcard, run the display service-mode card-bandwidth-mode command.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
